channel.title: Software on Jacob Goldstein's Website
channel.description: Recent content in Software on Jacob Goldstein's Website

item.title: Best Linux Software
item.description: Best Linux Desktop Software Awards per Category for 2017! hey! you do realize that this post is only written because i was bored to do anything else, right? also i want to make super clear that on these awards, we ran a set of completely democratic procedures, with a fully transparent voting. and by “we” i mean “me”, and by “voting” i mean a single vote! “mine” 👐 i will try to cover some basic categories, but not everything!
